Title: Private Benjamin
Writer: Nancy Meyers, Charles Shyer, Harvey Miller
Actors: Goldie Hawn, Eileen Brennan, Armand Assante, Robert Webber
Plot: When her husband dies on their wedding night, Judy decides to join the United States Army. She realizes that she has never been independent in her entire life. What looks like a bad decision at first, turns out not so bad at all. That is, until her superior officer makes sexual advances on her. She has been transferred to NATO headquarters in Europe and (re)meets the Frenchman Henri Tremont. Judy and Henri decide to marry, but will they?
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
